desc: Wichita Gift Company is a local Kansas gift shop offering engraved tumblers, custom canvas prints, wine stoppers, wedding presents, local souvenirs, cutting boards, and other unique giftshop items. Gifts for moms, teachers, anniversaries or just because. Shop online or in our store located next to UPS at Maple & Ridge.

layout.text: Custom Sublimated, Engraved, Printed or UV Printed Gifts
